quotes.quote: Maybe if we choose who we love more carefully we limit the possibility of getting hurt.
What hurts us is what heals us.
Sometimes, being hurt too many times, doesn't make you stronger, it destroy who you were, who you wanted to be and makes who you are today.
The easiest way to avoid getting hurt is to stop caring but not caring is the hardest thing to do.
Why waste your time getting hurt by someone when there's someone else out there waiting to make you happy.
The things which hurt, instruct.
Growing up is all about getting hurt. And then getting over it. You hurt. You recover. You move on. Odds are pretty good you're just going to get hurt again. But each time, you learn something.
Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
When you can't remember why you're hurt, that's when you're healed.
When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you.
Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
We rarely grow when we're happy, we grow when we hurt.
Forgive those who have hurt you.
As much as it hurts, I would rather miss someone than hit someone.
I still own my heart, which I know because it hurts so much.
We are injured and hurt emotionally, not so much by other people or what they say and don't say, but by our own attitude and our own response.
It is when we hurt that we learn.
Being hurt by someone you truly care about leaves a hole in you heart that only love can fill.
I've been hurt but I'll continue to love, for that gives me courage to go on with my life.
It's always better to be hurt by the truth than be comforted with a lie.
No one can hurt you without teaching a life's lesson. So accept it with love and kindness.
Give the world the best you have and you may get hurt. Give the world your best anyway.
I have never been hurt by anything I didn't say.
We want to hurt others but don't want to be hurt in return.
To hurt is as human as to breathe.
Just because one person's problem is less traumatic than another's doesn't mean they're required to hurt less.
The deepest wounds aren't the ones we get from other people hurting us. They are the wounds we give ourselves when we hurt other people.
You'll stop hurting when you stop hoping.
You decide for yourself when it will hurt.
The truth doesn't hurt unless it ought to.
All hurt is brain hurt.
When you have a heart, then you will be getting the hurt.
If they keep hurting you, love them and stay or love yourself and leave.
T's not what others have said that hurt us the most. It's the lies we believed about ourselves that caused us the most pain and hurt.
When someone hurts you time and time again, accept the fact that they dont care about you. Its a tough pill to swallow, but its necessary medicine.
A man is not hurt so much by what happens, as by his opinion of what happens.
You don't have to cry on everything that hurts you - sometimes, it is better to show how strong you are than to make them prove that they can make you die!
Even when someone hurts you, you choose how to struggle, resist, deny and receive.
God never wastes a hurt.
When people hurt you over and over, think of them like sandpaper. They may scratch and hurt you a bit, but in the end you end up polished and they end up useless.
Don't ask them WHY they hurt you, because all they'll tell you is lies and excuses. Just know they were wrong, and try to move on.
No man is hurt but by himself.
To go through hurt, you have to stumble on the rocks in order to walk on solid ground.
Some people use their own hurt as an excuse for hurting others.
No matter how far life pushes you down, no matter how much you hurt, you can always bounce back.
What you don't know can't hurt you.
Hurt's a reason to change, but all the hurt in the world don't change facts.
There are hurts so deep that one cannot reach them or heal them with words.
A remark generally hurts in proportion to its truth.
